group_1.textRight: Thank you.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!

group_1.textRight: You know, the last time we were on the roof,@I missed my chance to say it properly.
You know, for my birthday...

group_1.textCenter: Thank me for what I did on your birthday...@Why? That's quite unexpected.
Celebrating the birthdays of those we love is natural,@so there's no need for thanks...

group_1.textRight: No, it's thanks to that, that my recent days@have beenâ€”

group_1.textLeft: Ahhh...
B-but!
I have no right to receive your thanks!
If anything, you should be scolding me...

group_1.textRight: Why would I scold you?

group_1.textLeft: You've been in danger of being transferred@because I got carried away...

group_1.textRight: Ahhh, so you knew I was about to be@transferred...

group_1.textLeft: In the end, I suddenly changed my attitude...@...and was quite...rude to you...
That's why!

group_1.textRight: ...Well, that was a bit of a surprise.
But I was the one who distanced myself first,@so you don't have to worry about that...

group_1.textLeft: No, it's my fault.
My sudden change in attitude was unacceptable...
Teacher, you said you weren't very good with@children...
And you said you didn't like people very much,@either...
I was afraid I'd make you lose faith in people...
And if you were unable to continue teaching,@it would be my fault...

group_1.textRight: I see... That's what's been bothering you.
But I'm still a teacher.

group_1.textLeft: .........[wait:1.0][chara:103501:motion_300][chara:103501:lipSynch_1]Yes, that's right...@If I may ask... Why is that?

group_1.textRight: I don't understand, either...
At least, if it was the old me who was@feared by kids, I would have quit.
The only reason I haven't quit is thanks to you.
Thanks to you, I can finally face my students...
I can be a normal teacher.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...

group_1.textCenter: All right, we're gonna work a little harder today,@let's do 10 sets.

group_1.textRight: Umm... Teacher, I'm having trouble@understanding this question...

group_1.textLeft: Hm, which one...?
(I see... At that point, Teacher had already...)
(...grown as a teacher...@He's become stronger...)
(So strong that he wouldn't be hurt even if@I acted cold to him...)

group_1.textRight: Besides, after you did that, the rumors@disappeared and there was no transfer.
So in the end, all I can say to you is:@Thank you.
I really should have said it a long time ago.

group_1.textLeft: .........[wait:1.0][chara:103501:motion_100][chara:103501:cheek_0][chara:103501:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:103501:lipSynch_1]I see.

group_1.textRight: By the way, the change in your attitude since then@isn't just an act, is it?
Even now, our conversation feels a little awkward.

group_1.textLeft: Oh...! Weeell...that's true...
B-but it's not your fault...!
Just, it's not acting, either...@I'm not making sense to you, am I...
(If I don't tell him the reason...)
(He'll misunderstand and believe it's@something he's done.)
(That's far too pitiful...so, I need to...!)
...This is sudden, Teacher, but there are [textRed:certain@rumors] being circulated among everyone.
Have you heard?

group_1.textRight: By "everyone," do you mean the world,@not just around school?
.........[wait:1.0][chara:801100:lipSynch_1]Well, I've heard a few of them.
I didn't believe most of it, but...@Well, if they're true...
That would explain what you're saying...

group_1.textLeft: You're aware...@Then that makes this simple.
It's due to the magical power of a wish.
It wasn't your fault that my attitude@suddenly changed.

group_1.textRight: ...I see, you used that to force yourself to@hate me.

group_1.textLeft: It's not that I dislike you now.
It's just that I can't fall in love with you anymore...

group_1.textRight: Well, then...@You can come to the club now, can't you?

group_1.textLeft: I'd love to, but I'm afraid that circumstances@don't permit it...

group_1.textRight: If it's related to those rumors...that sounds@pretty dangerous.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I have a mission, a goal.@And until I've achieved that goal...

group_1.textRight: I see.
If that's what you want to do the most right now,@I'll support you.
Do your best.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I will!

group_1.textRight: Well, it's getting late.@I can't keep the other teachers waiting.
...Now then, I'll go back to inspecting in@preparation for the trip.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, goodbye...
Teacher!

group_1.textCenter: Wished to make my love for you disappear!
Just as I thought, my feelings for you@weren't a deception!
They were true feelings of love!
I was in love!@It was my first love!
Thank you very much!@It was a wonderful time!
Right now, the only ones I can place my faith@in are Magical Girls.
